code: import*as actionTypes from'./actionTypes';import axios from'../../axios-orders';export var addIngredients=function addIngredients(ingredientName){return{type:actionTypes.ADD_INGREDIENT,ingredientName:ingredientName};};export var removeIngredients=function removeIngredients(ingredientName){return{type:actionTypes.REMOVE_INGREDIENT,ingredientName:ingredientName};};export var setIngredients=function setIngredients(ingredients){return{type:actionTypes.SET_INGREDIENTS,ingredients:ingredients};};export var fetchIngredientsFailed=function fetchIngredientsFailed(){return{type:actionTypes.FETCH_INGREDIENTS_FAILED};};export var initIngredients=function initIngredients(){return function(dispatch){axios.get('https://react-burger-app-49b14.firebaseio.com/ingredients.json').then(function(response){dispatch(setIngredients(response.data));}).catch(function(error){dispatch(fetchIngredientsFailed());});};};
